page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: My clock radio wakes me at 7.00am to Mike Read on Radio 1.I have Rice Krispies for my breakfast but my sister has Shreddies.At 8.30am I get my school bag ready and set off for school.My mum is getting Andy's breakfast, he is our student who stays with us for a year.As soon as we get into the classroom we go to our desks and get our reading books out.I am reading "Little Women"by Louisa May Alcott.We have our first lesson which is maths.At playtime the boys play football and I sometimes practice disco dancing with Anne_Marie.After playtime our next lesson is English.We had to write a story about a magic ring.Most people have sandwiches at lunch time but I have school dinners.They aren't very nice.After dinner we do our project work.Home time is at 3.30pm .
